public class RenderService
extends RenderServiceImpl

Render service for GL20. Must run on the GL thread, not the Game thread!

Method Detail

render

public void render()
Render the current Scene. Obtains update lock. Enable CULL_FACE, DEPTH_TEST. Clear COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT.

Specified by:
render in class RenderServiceImpl
